My wife and I love to watch fairy Tail! Its an emotional experience. My wife and I love spending time together and this was yet another great show to watch with her. I might even write about it in my blog I write for her. ( www.breathingforher.com )

Great show and a must have to any anime fan. It is just sad though that I have to keep these in my wish list and keep on checking on it until their prices actually drop to the 20s... no way anyone should have to pay 30-40 bucks on each set.

Fairy Tail is just a fantastic series. Part 11 is a tad slower in part because it trails the action packed Part 10 but also because it is a storyline builder. I still found it was quite enjoyable. If you're a fan of the entire series than picking this up is a no brainer. I would recommend grabbing it at reduced price if possible.
I love Fairy Tail anyway and if course every episode jus t blows me away with it's amazing messages and amazing format for anime. It was my first anime and I want to cherish it FOREVER!!!!!

Amazon gave me this for free.  Somehow it figured out that I like anime.  Anyway, I understand from the area kids that Fairy Tail is hot, but I've been watching this stuff for decades already.  It's just another show.

Fairy Tail is an adventure that never ends. If you love anime and has a good story? Fairy Tail is the one for you. I love it! My only problem is I have to wait for next episodes.

I have all the Blue-Ray sets but sadly unlike the others in the series that are AB Blu-Ray region coded this is Region A only so I'm stuck with a coaster.  I'm aware that the item is listed as A only but Fairy Tail is often listed only as A despite it supporting both A and B regions but outside of this issue for me it's a good series that's worth watching I just can't watch this one.
Dont mind the price really really perfect for an anime like Fairy Tail

trust me when I say i'm a big fan of the series, but this one left me kind of disappointed.  everything seemed kinda slow after everything with the s-class trial. not to mention it felt short. disc 2 only had 2 episodes. I would still buy it if you are a fan of the series but i'm not to sure about paying full price of a full volume.
The dub quality is fantastic and Funimation does a wonderful job. This set in particular is mostly filler, but if you don't mind, grab it for the few canon episodes it has.
